title: Retailers shares drop

organizations.name: reuters news agency | brand attribution guidelines | careers  reuters

text:
Retailers shares drop 3:54am IST - 01:01 
Macy's, J.C. Penney, and Sears shares drop on news of store closures and job cuts. Fred Katayama reports.
